summary: The life of three parents who have all shared the loss of a child. Motives are not what they seem and sanity is in short supply in this thriller.
cast: Kristina Klebe|Alexa Havins|Joe Swanberg|Alexia Rasmussen|Kitsie Duncan|Erika Hoveland|Jim Dougherty|Mark A. Nash|Adam Stephenson|Bruce Spielbauer|Faust Checho|Jason Dixie|Melissa O'Brien|Dennis Crosswhite|Brittany Wagner|Angel Kerns|Dianne Bischoff|Phyllis Munro|Steven Durgarn|Jennifer Wilkens|Shayla Hardy|Mike DeIulio|Glenna Reinhardt|Kelron Mixon|Erica Stikeleather|Jennifer Bales|Ronnie Johnstone|Samantha Eileen DeTurk|Dave Snow|Jason Nelson|Leland Franklin|Raymond Kester|Adam King|Rachel Illingworth|Xavier Parker|Nicholas J. Moore
title: Proxy
